org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka

类 KafkaJsonTableSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.KafkaTableSource
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.connectors.kafka.KafkaJsonTableSource
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.flink.table.sources.DefinedFieldMapping, org.apache.flink.table.sources.DefinedProctimeAttribute, org.apache.flink.table.sources.DefinedRowtimeAttributes, org.apache.flink.table.sources.StreamTableSource<Row>, org.apache.flink.table.sources.TableSource<Row>
    直接已知子类:
    Kafka010JsonTableSource, Kafka011JsonTableSource, Kafka08JsonTableSource, Kafka09JsonTableSource

    public abstract class KafkaJsonTableSource
extends KafkaTableSource
implements org.apache.flink.table.sources.DefinedFieldMapping
    A version-agnostic Kafka JSON StreamTableSource.

    The version-specific Kafka consumers need to extend this class and override KafkaTableSource.createKafkaConsumer(String, Properties, DeserializationSchema)}.

    The field names are used to parse the JSON file and so are the types.

    • 嵌套类概要

      Abstract builder for a KafkaJsonTableSource to be extended by builders of subclasses of KafkaJsonTableSource.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • KafkaJsonTableSource

        protected KafkaJsonTableSource(java.lang.String topic,
                               java.util.Properties properties,
                               org.apache.flink.table.api.TableSchema tableSchema,
                               org.apache.flink.table.api.TableSchema jsonSchema)
        Creates a generic Kafka JSON StreamTableSource.
        参数:
        topic - Kafka topic to consume.
        properties - Properties for the Kafka consumer.
        tableSchema - The schema of the table.
        jsonSchema - The schema of the JSON messages to decode from Kafka.

      • setFailOnMissingField

        protected void setFailOnMissingField(boolean failOnMissingField)
        Sets the flag that specifies the behavior in case of missing fields. TableSource will fail for missing fields if set to true. If set to false, the missing field is set to null.
        参数:
        failOnMissingField - Flag that specifies the TableSource behavior in case of missing fields.

      • setFieldMapping

        protected void setFieldMapping(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> fieldMapping)
        Sets the mapping from table schema fields to JSON schema fields.
        参数:
        fieldMapping - The mapping from table schema fields to JSON schema fields.
